items.details: Hearty and healthy! Spaghetti tossed with chunky tuna, fresh tomatoes, and black olives.
A rich combination of creamy white sauce with flavorful bacon, ham and button mushrooms topped with grated premium parmesan cheese.
A hefty serving of Shakeys's classic spaghetti served with garlic bread.
Meaty and chunky italian sausage on baked fusilli pasta with marinara sauce.
Giant sized, delicious home-style meatballs, on top of premium pasta with chunky tomato meat suace.
